title: Kadhalaada Lyrics Vivegam
stanzas:
unnodu vazhvadhu aanandhame
ovvoru pozhudhilum perinbamae
theeraadha thaevaigal aanandhamae
illaigla ingillai perinbamae

kaadhal aada kadhal aada
kaaththirundhaene
aasai noolil
paasap pookkal
korththirundhene

seiyyaadha madhavam neeye
poyyaadha paerarul neeye
oyaadha thaenmazhai
adhai yaendhavae
pudhu boomi seivomae

unnodu vazhvadhu aanandhame
ovvoru pozhudhilum perinbamae
theeraadha thaevaigal aanandhamae
illaigla ingillai perinbamae

neela vaanam maaindha podhum
nee iruppaaye
deva gaanam thooya mounam
nee koduppaaye

pillai dheivam
mannil thondrida
vaazhvu neezhuvomey

unnodu vazhvadhu aanandhame
ovvoru pozhudhilum perinbamae
theeraadha thaevaigal aanandhamae
illaigla ingillai perinbamae
